summary: This is an email dated July 24, 2019, providing a morning update on Jeffrey Epstein's suicide watch status at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. It indicates Epstein was on suicide watch and no one was under psych observation. The sender is a forensic psychologist with the U.S. Public Health Service assigned to the Bureau of Prisons.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as inmate #76318-054 and listed as being on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

events.title: Daily Suicide Watch Update for Epstein
events.description: A morning status report indicates Jeffrey Epstein was on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, with no other inmates under psych observation.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: On July 24, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The update was sent by a forensic psychologist with the U.S. Public Health Service assigned to the Bureau of Prisons, whose name is redacted.
The document is an official Bureau of Prisons communication marked as potentially containing sensitive information.
The email indicates the sender was out of the office from July 15-28, 2019, but still provided the update on July 24.
